trans-unit.source: A major part of this package works by patching several core Plone and CMF classes. The patches also apply when you do not have this package installed in your Plone Site. This may give unwanted results, like changing the login name of a user when his or her e-mail address is changed. This also means that when you have multiple Plone Sites in one Zope instance, you should either install this package in all of them or not use it at all and remove it from your buildout.
trans-unit.target: 这个包的一个主要部分是通过修补几个核心的Plone和CMF类。这些补丁也适用于你没有在你的Plone站点安装这个包的时候。这可能会带来不想要的结果,比如当用户的电子邮件地址被改变时,他或她的登录名也会被改变。这也意味着当你在一个Zope实例中拥有多个Plone网站时,你应该在所有的网站中安装这个包,或者根本不使用它,并从你的构建中移除它。

trans-unit.source: Adapted validate_personalize.vpy. Change compared to default Plone: check the validity of the email address as a login name. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 改编了validate_personalize.vpy。与默认的Plone相比,变化:检查电子邮件地址作为登录名的有效性。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Add it to the eggs of your Plone 3 buildout. With Plone 3.2.x or earlier also add it to the zcml option of your instance. Install it in the Add-ons (Extra Packages) control panel in your Plone Site. Installing simply adds a new skin layer named ‘emaillogin’.
trans-unit.target: 将其添加到您的Plone 3构建的蛋中。使用Plone 3.2.x或更早版本时，还将其添加到实例的zcml选项中。将其安装在您的Plone站点的“加载项（附加软件包）”控制面板中。安装仅会添加一个名为“ emaillogin”的新外观层。

trans-unit.source: Added classifiers for Plone 3.2 and 3.3 in setup.py. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 在setup.py中添加了Plone 3.2和3.3的分类器。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Added i18n. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 增加了i18n。[Maurits]

trans-unit.source: Added profiles/default/metadata.xml: version = 1. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 添加了 profiles/default/metadata.xml:版本=1。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Added upgrade step to migrate all existing users to have a lowercase login name (when their e-mail address is used as login name). [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 增加了升级步骤,将所有现有用户迁移为小写的登录名(当他们的电子邮件地址被用作登录名时)。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: After a successfull edit of the personalize form, do not travere to the personalize_form, but redirect to it. This solves an error “Forbidden: Form authenticator is invalid.” when changing your email address (= login name) and then saving the form a second time. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 成功编辑了个性化表单后，请勿遍历Personalize_form，而应重定向到该表单。这样可以解决错误“禁止：表单验证器无效”。更改您的电子邮件地址（=登录名），然后再次保存表格时。[特产]

trans-unit.source: Allow logins with email address rather than login name.
trans-unit.target: 允许用电子邮件地址而不是登录名登录。

trans-unit.source: Also show the error when the email address is not a valid username. [maurits+mike]
trans-unit.target: 当电子邮件地址不是有效的用户名时,也会显示错误。[maurits+mike]

trans-unit.source: As an administrator, when you change the login name of a user in the ZMI, this does not update the email.
trans-unit.target: 作为管理员,当您在ZMI中更改用户的登录名时,不会更新邮件。

trans-unit.source: Avoid possible circular import for the PloneMembershipTool in PlonePAS and CMFPlone. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 避免PlonePAS和CMFPlone中PloneMembershipTool可能的循环导入。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Changed getMemberByLoginName and ZODBUserManager.authenticateCredentials to explicitly search for the lower case login name if the initial literal search does not work. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修改了getMemberByLoginName和ZODBUserManager.authenticateCredentials,如果最初的文字搜索不起作用,则明确搜索小写的登录名。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Changed validate_personalize.vpy to allow changing your preferences again. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修改了validate_personalize.vpy,允许再次更改您的偏好。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Changelog for collective.emaillogin
trans-unit.target: Collective.emaillogin的变更日志

trans-unit.source: Fixed error on reinstall where the default skin would be set to the no longer existing emaillogin skin. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 修正了重装时默认皮肤被设置为不再存在的 emaillogin 皮肤的错误。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed join form to also work in newer Plones by using the @@authenticator provider for protecting this join form. Keeps working in Plone 3.0 as well (which does not use plone.protect). [maurits+mike]
trans-unit.target: 通过使用@@authenticator提供者来保护这个加入表单,修正了加入表单在新的Plone中也能工作。在Plone 3.0中也能正常工作(不使用plone.protect)。[maurits+mike]

trans-unit.source: Fixed wrong condition and double definition where allowEnterPassword meant you were actually not allowed to enter a password. It worked fine but was confusingly stated the wrong way around. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 实际上固定错误状况和双重定义，其中allowEnterPassword意味着你不会允许输入密码。它工作正常，但令人困惑地指出了错误的解决方法。[特产]

trans-unit.source: Future
trans-unit.target: 未来

trans-unit.source: Gotchas
trans-unit.target: 疑难杂症

trans-unit.source: If you register with one@example.org, then change it to two@example.org, then no one can register a new user with one@example.org or change the e-mail address of an existing user to one@example.org. This is because it will forever be used as userid. Note that when you now change your address to three@example.org, your intermediate address of two@example.org is free for the taking.
trans-unit.target: 如果您注册one@example.org，然后将其更改为 two@example.org，那么没有人可以用一个新的用户注册 one@example.org或更改现有用户的电子邮件地址，以 一个@的例子。 org。这是因为它将永远用作用户标识。请注意，当您现在将地址更改为 three@example.org时，您可以免费使用中间地址two@example.org。

trans-unit.source: In Plone 4 this package is deprecated, as Plone 4 already supports logging in with your email address as an option: http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9214
trans-unit.target: 在Plone 4中，不推荐使用此软件包，因为Plone 4已经支持使用您的电子邮件地址登录：http : //dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9214

trans-unit.source: In join_form_validate.vpy turn the e-mail address to lowercase. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 在join_form_validate.vpy中把邮件地址改为小写。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: In the mailPassword method explicitly disallow looking for a member with the given forgotten user id when this is an e-mail address. We only search for users with that e-mail address as login name. This only has an effect when you have changed your e-mail address to something really different (instead of just a change in the case). Without this change, you could reset your password with your old address, but could not login with that address. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 在mailPassword方法中,明确地禁止寻找具有给定的遗忘用户id的成员,当这是一个电子邮件地址时,我们只搜索以该电子邮件地址作为登录名的用户。我们只搜索使用该电子邮件地址作为登录名的用户。这只有在你把你的电子邮件地址改成真正不同的东西时才有效果(而不是仅仅改了一下)。如果没有这个变化,你可以用你的旧地址重新设置密码,但不能用这个地址登录。[Maurits]

trans-unit.source: In validate_personalize.vpy turn the e-mail address to lowercase. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 在validate_personalize.vpy中把邮件地址改为小写。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Initial release. [maurits, guido]
trans-unit.target: 最初的释放。[毛利茨,圭多]

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: It is best to install this on a fresh Plone site. The login names of current users are not changed. There is code in core Plone 4 for this, so you may want to look there if you need it.
trans-unit.target: 最好是安装在一个全新的Plone网站上。当前用户的登录名是不会改变的。在Plone 4的核心部分有这样的代码,所以如果你需要的话,你可以去那里看看。

trans-unit.source: Moved to https://github.com/collective/collective.emaillogin [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 移至https://github.com/collective/collective.emaillogin [maurits]

trans-unit.source: No longer register our own skin path (skin selection), but just add our emaillogin skin layer to the existing skin selections. [maurits+mike]
trans-unit.target: 不再注册我们自己的皮肤路径(皮肤选择),而只是将我们的EMAILOGIN皮肤层添加到现有的皮肤选择中。[maurits+mike]

trans-unit.source: No, these are not bugs. Or if they are bugs, then they are bugs that are too hard to fix without introducing other bugs. They might be unexpected though, so we call them gotchas.
trans-unit.target: 不,这些都不是bug。或者说,如果它们是错误,那么它们就是太难修复的错误,而不会引入其他错误。但它们可能是意料之外的,所以我们称它们为 "障碍"。

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概述

trans-unit.source: Patch CMFPlone.MembershipTool.testCurrentPassword to authenticate with the login name. The code in Plone 3.3.5 itself already works (and is simply copied here), but Plone 3.1.7 has an error that is triggered for us as the user id is not always the same as the login name. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 补丁CMFPlone.MembershipTool.testCurrentPassword,用登录名进行验证。在Plone 3.3.5中的代码本身已经可以工作了(简单复制到这里),但是Plone 3.1.7有一个错误会被我们触发,因为用户ID并不总是和登录名相同。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Patch PloneTool.setMemberProperties to always set the e-mail address to lower case and to update the login name when the e-mail address changes. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 补丁PloneTool.setMemberProperties,将电子邮件地址设置为小写,并在电子邮件地址改变时更新登录名。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Patch Products.PlonePAS.tools.membership.MembershipTool.addMember to always add the member as lowercase, also when not called from registered.cpy [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 补丁 Products.PlonePAS.tools.membership.MembershipTool.addMember,使其总是以小写形式添加成员,当不从registered.py调用时也是如此 [maurits]。

trans-unit.source: Patch RegistrationTool.isMemberIdAllowed. When the id that is passed in is already in use as login name, we do not accept it as user id either. Also, in various spots where isMemberIdAllowed is called, the id is really meant as login name. Possibly this fix is only needed for Plone 3.1 and earlier, as I am sure I have tested this before on Plone 3.3.6. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 补丁注册工具.isMemberIdAllowed。当传入的id已经作为登录名使用时,我们也不接受它作为用户id。另外,在调用isMemberIdAllowed的地方,id其实是指登录名。可能这个修正只适用于Plone 3.1和更早的版本,因为我确信我之前在Plone 3.3.6上测试过。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Patch the login method from Products.PlonePAS.plugins.cookie_handler.ExtendedCookieAuthHelper. This is the code from Plone 3.3.6; it is included because Plone 3.1.7 does the wrong thing for us here. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 补上Products.PlonePAS.plugins.cookie_handler.ExtendedCookieAuthHelper的登录方法。这是Plone 3.3.6中的代码,包含它是因为Plone 3.1.7在这里为我们做了错误的事情。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Patched some methods in PasswordResetTool and RegistrationTool to make sure you can actually reset your password, even after changing your email address. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 对PasswordResetTool和RegistrationTool中的一些方法进行了修补,以确保即使在更改了电子邮件地址之后,你也能真正重置密码。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Refactored authenticateCredentials. This avoids getting a message stating you are logged in when in fact you are not logged in. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 重构了 authenticateCredentials。这避免了当你没有登录时,收到一条说明你已经登录的消息。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Removed mail_me functionality from join_form as this claimed to be sending the password, which Plone has not been doing for a long time, if ever. The backend handling for this was already removed from Plone itself. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 删除了join_form中的mail_me功能,因为它声称要发送密码,而Plone已经很久没有这样做了。后台的处理已经从Plone本身删除了。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Removed personalize_form.cpt(.metadata) as there was no important difference with the one from default Plone. [maurits+mike]
trans-unit.target: 删除了personalize_form.cpt(.metadata),因为和默认的Plone的没有重要区别。[maurits+mike]

trans-unit.source: Since version 1.0 we explicitly convert e-mail addresses to lowercase. You should be able to login with any mix of upper and lower case letters.
trans-unit.target: 从1.0版本开始,我们明确地将电子邮件地址转换为小写字母。您应该可以用任何大写和小写字母混合登录。

trans-unit.source: Since version 1.0, whenever an e-mail address is set, we automatically convert it to lowercase. You cannot set an e-mail address to upper or mixed case. When logging in or resetting a password the case does not need to match: we look for the given login but also for the lowercased login.
trans-unit.target: 从1.0版本开始,只要设置了电子邮件地址,我们就会自动将其转换为小写。您不能将电子邮件地址设置为大写或混合大小写。当登录或重置密码时,大小写不需要匹配:我们会查找给定的登录名,但也会查找小写的登录名。

trans-unit.source: So we strongly advise not to use this package on Plone 4. But your instance will still start up (tested on Plone 4.0a4) and you can uninstall the package through the UI. You may need to manually remove
trans-unit.target: 所以我们强烈建议不要在Plone 4上使用这个包。但是你的实例仍然会启动(在Plone 4.0a4上测试),你可以通过用户界面卸载这个包。你可能需要手动删除

trans-unit.source: Take over a small change in default Plone to the personalize.cpy.
trans-unit.target: 接管默认的Plone对personalize.cpy的小改动。

trans-unit.source: The initial e-mail address is used as userid. This id never ever changes. In places where the userid is displayed this original userid is shown, which is normally fine until the email address is overwritten – once this is done the original email address will be displayed rather than the new one. (Plone 4 fixes this in the core.) There may be some more spots in Plone that for example search only for users by id so when you use that to search on login name this may fail. Also, there are spots in the Plone or CMF or Zope code that have a userid as input but use it as login name or the other way around so be careful when you start hacking yourself.
trans-unit.target: 初始电子邮件地址用作用户ID。此ID永远不会更改。在显示用户ID的地方，会显示此原始用户ID，通常在覆盖电子邮件地址之前可以正常使用-完成此操作后，将显示原始电子邮件地址，而不是新的电子邮件地址。 （Plone 4在核心中解决了此问题。）Plone中可能还有更多位置，例如仅按ID搜索用户，因此当您使用它搜索登录名时，此操作可能会失败。另外，在Plone或CMF或Zope代码中也有一些斑点，这些斑点具有输入的用户名，但又用作登录名或其他方式，因此在开始黑客攻击时请务必小心。

trans-unit.source: This package allow logins with email address rather than login name. It applies some (somewhat hackish) patches to Plone’s membership tool and memberdata class, after which the email address, on save, is saved as the login name for members. This makes that members can log in using their email address rather than some additional id, and when the email address changes the login name is changed along with it.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包允许使用电子邮件地址而不是登录名进行登录。它对Plone的成员资格工具和memberdata类应用了一些补丁（有些黑），然后将保存的电子邮件地址保存为成员的登录名。这使得成员可以使用其电子邮件地址而不是某些其他ID登录，并且当电子邮件地址更改时，登录名也随之更改。

trans-unit.source: Upgrading
trans-unit.target: 升级

trans-unit.source: Use email address instead of login/user name in some more spots, like the login form and in validation. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 在一些更多的地方,如登录表格和验证中,使用电子邮件地址代替登录/用户名。[maurits]

trans-unit.source: Warning
trans-unit.target: 警告

trans-unit.source: When upgrading from version 0.8, an upgrade step is run to change all login names to lower case, for those login names that are already e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: 从0.8版本升级时,对于已经是电子邮件地址的登录名,会运行升级步骤,将所有登录名改为小写。

trans-unit.source: When you change your e-mail address, you do not get a confirmation e-mail to check if you did not make any typos and it is a real address. This means you will not be able to login if you do not remember this typo; a password reset will then also not work. This could be considered a problem of Plone in general and not specific for this add-on, though we are hit harder by it. Might be a nice candidate for a PLIP (PLone Improvement Proposal) or first an extra add-on.
trans-unit.target: 当您更改电子邮件地址时，您不会收到确认电子邮件来检查您是否输入了任何错字，并且它是真实地址。这意味着如果您不记得该错字，将无法登录。密码重置也将不起作用。总体上，这可能被认为是Plone的问题，而不是特定于此附加组件的问题，尽管我们为此受到了更大的打击。可能是PLIP（PLone改进提案）的不错候选人，或者首先是额外的附件。

trans-unit.source: When you register with original@example.org and change this to new@example.org, you can no longer login with your original address. You can only login with your current e-mail address, though the case (upper, lower, mixed) should not matter anymore.
trans-unit.target: 当您向original@example.org注册并将其更改为 new@example.org时，您将无法再使用原始地址登录。尽管大小写（大写，小写，混合）不再重要，但您只能使用当前的电子邮件地址登录。

trans-unit.source: added german translation [deichi]
trans-unit.target: 添加德文翻译[deichi]

trans-unit.source: collective.emaillogin Package Readme
trans-unit.target: Collective.emillogin 包裹自述

trans-unit.source: emaillogin
trans-unit.target: emaillogin

trans-unit.source: from the skin selections in the Properties tab of portal_skins in the ZMI. Since the package does some patches on startup, you should still remove it from the eggs and zcml options of your instance, rerun buildout and start your instance again.
trans-unit.target: 从ZMI中portal_skins的属性选项卡中的皮肤选择中删除。由于该包会在启动时打一些补丁,所以你还是应该从实例的 egg 和 zcml 选项中删除它,重新运行 buildout 并重新启动实例。
